overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Matrimonio SMART APIs provide secure access to guest data with API Key authentication. They support CRUD operations on various resources and Twilio webhook integration for WhatsApp message tracking.

auth.title: Authentication
auth.description: All requests require Bearer Token authentication
auth.importantDesc: The API token is only visible at creation time. Store it securely.
auth.step1: Go to Admin Settings → API Keys
auth.step4: Select weddings the key will have access to
auth.step6: Copy and store the generated token

permissionsSection.title: Permissions System
permissionsSection.description: Each API Key can have granular permissions per resource

list.title: List Guests
list.desc: Retrieve all guests. Automatically filters by authorized weddings.

detail.title: Guest Detail
detail.desc: Retrieve details of a single guest.

create.title: Create Guest
create.desc: Create a new guest. Requires write permission.

delete.title: Delete Guest
delete.desc: Delete a guest. Requires write permission.

webhookSection.title: Twilio Webhook for WhatsApp
webhookSection.desc: Receive updates on the status of WhatsApp messages sent via Twilio
webhookSection.step1: Go to Twilio Console → Messaging → Settings
webhookSection.step3: Add the x-api-key header with your token

handler.title: Webhook Handler
handler.desc: Endpoint to receive status updates from Twilio.

webhookSection.autoSend: Twilio automatically sends notifications to this endpoint when a message status changes.
